name: docx2html
description: a javascript docx converter to html based on docx4js

scripts.pretest: browserify -t adeamdify -r ./main.js:docx2html -o dist/docx2html.js  | uglifyjs dist/docx2html.js -o dist/docx2html.min.js
scripts.prepublish: browserify -t adeamdify -r ./main.js:docx2html -o dist/docx2html.js  | uglifyjs dist/docx2html.js -o dist/docx2html.min.js
